species.name: manectric
descriptions: Because lightning falls in their vicinities, MANECTRIC were thought to have been born from lightning. In battle, they create thunderclouds.
It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
Its nest can be found where a thunderbolt hits. It is discharging electricity from its mane.
It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.

abilities.name: static
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: lightning-rod
abilities.effect: Redirects single-target electric moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Electric moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

abilities.name: minus
abilities.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.
